helpChat.prefilled.materialInvestigation: I'd like to start an investigation on a piece of equipment.
helpChat.voiceInputHint: You can also use the microphone to dictate your message.

userManual.section.gettingStarted.title: 1. Getting Started: Account Creation
userManual.section.gettingStarted.intro: Welcome to Nexus Support Hub! Your role determines how you sign up and interact with the system.
userManual.section.gettingStarted.manage: Navigate to the Sign Up page.
Select the "Manager" role from the dropdown.
Choose a subscription plan for your company. If you select a paid plan, you will be redirected to PayPal to complete the subscription before your account is created.
Enter your new, unique Company Name. This name is critical, as your team will use it to log in.
Complete the rest of the form and click the final button to create your company account.
userManual.section.gettingStarted.agentU: For Agents & Users: Joining a Company
Navigate to the Sign Up page.
In the "Existing Company Name" field, enter the exact company name provided by your manager.
Complete the form and click "Sign Up". You will now be part of your company's team.
userManual.section.usingTheApp.title: 2. Using the Application
userManual.section.usingTheApp.login.des: To log in, you will always need three pieces of information: your email, your password, and your company's name.
userManual.section.usingTheApp.user.desc: As a user, your main goal is to get help. Click "Get AI Help" to start a chat with our AI assistant, Nexus. Describe your problem, and Nexus will guide you. If it cannot solve the issue, it will suggest creating a ticket, which you can finalize and submit.
userManual.section.usingTheApp.agent.des: Agents can view unassigned tickets and take ownership of them. You can also see a list of tickets currently assigned to you. Open any ticket to communicate with the user and resolve their issue.
userManual.section.usingTheApp.manager.d: The Manager Dashboard provides a complete overview. You can:
userManual.section.usingTheApp.manager.f: View all tickets in the system, regardless of who they are assigned to.
Assign or re-assign tickets to available agents.
Filter tickets to analyze trends and performance.
Manage users: update their roles (e.g., promote a User to an Agent) or delete users.
userManual.section.voice.title: 3. Voice Features
userManual.section.voice.desc: The application includes voice features to enhance your experience. You can use your microphone to dictate messages in the chat, and the AI's responses can be read aloud automatically. Use the speaker and microphone icons to control these features.

landing.hero.title: Smarter Support, Happier Customers.
landing.hero.subtitle: Nexus Support Hub combines cutting-edge AI with a powerful ticketing system to resolve issues faster and delight your users.
landing.ai.title: Nexus AI Assistant: Your First Line of Support
landing.ai.subtitle: Nexus AI helps your users in real-time and automatically transforms conversations into organized tickets for your teams.
landing.ai.chatDesc: Nexus AI dialogues with your users, understands their problems, and provides immediate assistance based on its knowledge base.
landing.ai.ticketCreationDesc: When AI reaches its limits, it automatically creates a ticket with the entire conversation history, suggested category, and priority.
landing.ai.smartAssignmentDesc: Created tickets can be automatically assigned to appropriate agents based on category and workload.
landing.demo.title: Discover Support Hub in Video
landing.demo.subtitle: Watch a complete demonstration of the platform: AI chat, ticket creation, dashboards, and multi-role management.
landing.features.title: Everything You Need in a Modern Help Desk
landing.features.subtitle: From AI-powered chat to secure multi-company architecture, we've got you covered.
landing.features.ai.title: Instant AI Assistance
landing.features.ai.desc: Our AI, Nexus, provides 24/7 support, automatically creating summarized and categorized tickets when human help is needed.
landing.features.secure.title: Secure & Multi-Tenant
landing.features.secure.desc: Each company's data is completely isolated, ensuring privacy and security with robust role-based access control.
landing.features.voice.title: Voice Enabled
landing.features.voice.desc: Enhance accessibility with voice commands for chat and automatic text-to-speech for AI responses.
landing.features.multilingual.title: Multilingual Interface
landing.features.multilingual.desc: User interface available in French, English, and Arabic to accommodate international teams.
landing.features.dashboards.title: Role-Based Dashboards
landing.features.dashboards.desc: Dedicated views for users, agents, and managers with ticket management tailored to each level of responsibility.
landing.pricing.title: Transparent and Affordable Pricing
landing.pricing.subtitle: Start free to test the platform, then scale according to your needs. Simple pricing per active agent.
landing.pricing.customSolutionPrompt: Need a custom solution for your business?
landing.pricing.contactUs: Contact us for a personalized quote
landing.contact.title: Ready to improve your customer support?
landing.contact.subtitle: Join companies using Support Hub to provide modern customer service with artificial intelligence assistance.
pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your team's needs. No hidden fees.
pricing.freemium.name: Freemium
pricing.freemium.desc: Perfect for small teams or trying out the platform.
pricing.standard.name: Standard
pricing.standard.desc: For growing teams that need the full power of our AI.
pricing.pro.name: Pro
pricing.pro.desc: For teams that demand the best, with advanced features.
pricing.enterprise.text: Need a custom solution for your business?

infographic.subtitle: A complete customer support solution in 3 simple steps
infographic.steps.step1.title: Create a Ticket
infographic.steps.step1.description: Users easily create support tickets with all necessary details
infographic.steps.step2.title: Smart Assignment
